data.title: Tereza Courmont Vlkova
data.meta_description: Tereza Courmont Vlkova is a partner in the Global Finance department. Her experience is in of leveraged financing, fund financing & banking/regulatory law, advising borrowers, lenders (senior/mezzanine lenders & debt funds), & private equity funds.
data.text:
Tereza Courmont Vlkova is a partner in the Global Finance department in the firmâ€™s Paris office. Her experience is in the field of leveraged financing, fund financing and banking/regulatory law, advising borrowers, lenders (senior/mezzanine lenders and debt funds), and private equity funds.

Ms. Courmont Vlkova joined the firm in 2016.

Tereza is an active member of the Women's PHAN Network and France Invest's Talent & Diversity Committee.
